Name: The First Gunshot I
Words: Your memory ends right thereâ€”everything afterward is a void...

Name: The First Gunshot III
Words: The terminal's screen goes dark before lighting up again and immediately displaying a notification.

Name: The Crossfire I
Words: A blinding white light suddenly erupts, dispersing the green mist around you.

Name: The Crossfire III
Words: Aggressive slashes and pursuing gunfire interweave like a torrential downpour.

Name: Base Point Neutralization I
Words: Yellow sand churns as a gust of wind cuts through the thick dust.

Name: Base Point Neutralization III
Words: The source of the interference... is the facility itself.

Name: Deep Realm Endgame I
Words: The final stretch. Let's move out.

Name: Deep Realm Endgame II
Words: As the radiance gradually fades, the world before your eyes returns to its original state.
